69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (02:30): it's a pain in the neck :-)
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (02:30): i'm totally stuck on how to work around an english grammar issue
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (02:34): 69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e: what kind of issues? Not being able to use "must"? avoiding imperatives ?
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (02:35): now sees that 69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e said "issue" (singular)
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (02:38): i have:
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (02:38): The DOM attribute relList must reflect the rel content attribute
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (02:38): ...and I need a way to remove the "must", along with any other characters you want to remove, and end up with a gramatically correct useful sentence
fefe4c60d912e295e59fd874577ca7f9 (02:41): s/must reflect/reflects/ ?
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (02:41): you added an s
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (02:41): i can't add characters
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (02:41): only remove
fefe4c60d912e295e59fd874577ca7f9 (02:41): I did wonder :)
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (02:41): (i can change the original sentence to make this possible)
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (02:41): (but i don't want to make it an awkward sentence to do so)
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (02:42): i'm thinking of solving this in some other way
e3fb62ebfa4f36acf5cbff6a6ed0f2e0 (02:43): maybe have a simple mapping table
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (02:44): yeah
e3fb62ebfa4f36acf5cbff6a6ed0f2e0 (02:44): though I'm still not sure how to do the sentence in that case :)
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (02:44): oh i'll just hide the whole paragraph
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (02:44): and have a separate non-normative table
e3fb62ebfa4f36acf5cbff6a6ed0f2e0 (02:44): k
